tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_infrastructure (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE roads (
    road_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR(100),
    length_km DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_id INT NOT NULL,
    bridge_id INT NOT NULL,
    utility_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (road_id) REFERENCES Roads(road_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (bridge_id) REFERENCES Bridges(bridge_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (utility_id) REFERENCES Utilities(utility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Roads (
    road_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    road_length FLOAT NOT NULL,
    construction_date DATE,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Bridges (
    bridge_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bridge_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    bridge_span FLOAT NOT NULL,
    construction_date DATE,
    inspection_date DATE,
    engineer_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Utilities (
    utility_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    utility_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    utility_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE,
    maintenance_frequency INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE Inspections (
    inspection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    inspector_department VARCHAR(100),
    inspection_type VARCHAR(100),
    inspection_result VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
    maintenance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL,
    maintenance_description TEXT
);
